    public class AirportList
extends IdentifiedRecordList<Airport>
    Contains methods specific to lists of airports

    • Method Detail

      • setNumberOfRoutes

        public void setNumberOfRoutes(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> numRoutes,
                              boolean reset)
        For each airport whose IATA or ICAO code is a key in the mapping, set that airport to have that key's mapped value. This can be used to set the number of routes for a subset of the airports in the internal list without affecting the others. Where more than one key of the mapping resolves to the same airport, the number of routes will be set from the last key visited.
        Parameters:
        numRoutes - a mapping from airport IATA/ICAO
        reset - whether to zero the number of all airports not in the mapping
